name: HumanPerf Software
overview:
HumanPerf Software is the French leader in the management of continuous improvement activities, and one of the main leaders in innovation processes.

IDhall SC, by HumanPerf Software, is the solution that will help companies achieve their most challenging objectives for innovation and continuous improvement. Over the years, HumanPerfâ€™s team of experts and their clients have worked together to supply the right software solutions and we work to an agenda designed to achieve three very important goals: â€¢ Review all the potential opportunities open to the company. â€¢ Analyse, prioritise and plan ideas and action plans. â€¢ Implement and measure ROI in real time. A collaborative software Built as a collaborative platform, the IDhall SC solution can give every employee a chance to express his or her ideas. Furthermore, the experience of exchanging and sharing knowledge and suggestions has never been so easy with the “Make a Contribution” option and the document management tool. Finally, the email management system will ease the co-ordination and movement of team’s actions to maximum effect and it will empower them to be a part of the decision making process. A comprehensive solution With its different modules, the IDhall SC solution is entirely adaptable to the needs of each company. Indeed, among the possibilities offered by the software, companies will be able to: â€¢ Define different user profiles for every type of user, â€¢ Manage the time the resources will dedicate to their projects, â€¢ Review the progress of projects with visual graphics, â€¢ Identify the targets the company wishes to focus on. IDhall SC is the new generation software that can match each and every requirement in a very special way.
